bisq.network.name: Bisq
bisq.network.call_to_action: Download for Windows, Download for macOS, Download for Debian/Ubuntu, Download for Red Hat/Fedora
usecases: Buy and sell bitcoin for fiat (or other cryptocurrencies) privately and securely
solutions: Bisq's peer-to-peer network and open-source desktop software
key_features: Decentralized trading on a global P2P network
Safe trades with deposits held in 2-of-2 multisig wallets
Private data storage on local disk
Open-source code and transparent project strategy
Easy to use with trades possible in under 10 minutes
Decentralized governance through the Bisq DAO

solutions: Reliable and secure cryptocurrency trading platform
Free coins and games to earn more crypto
Access to IEO tokens at a discount rate
Real-time crypto price reporting and trading
Lowest fees for buying and selling digital assets
key_features: Real-time crypto price reporting and trading

use_cases: Swap native assets between supported chains
Deposit assets to earn yield from swaps
Provide liquidity to THORChain and earn from swap fees
Swap assets without relying on wrapped tokens
Bond RUNE to secure the network
key_features: Swap, earn, and borrow with native assets
Single asset liquidity with savers vaults
Secured by the native token RUNE
Native asset swaps without wrapped or pegged assets
Native assets without the need for RUNE to pay for transactions
Secure funds with open source code
Extensive research, design, and community governance for new features
Upcoming features include synthetic assets, DEX aggregation, savers vaults, and more

bitcoin_dex.name: Komodo Wallet
solutions: Hold and trade hundreds of cryptocurrencies on your mobile
Hold and trade hundreds of cryptocurrencies on your desktop
Swap your crypto from one blockchain to another
key_features: No trading fee for makers, takers only pay 0.13%
Immediate trading, no deposit or withdrawal wait times
Unrestricted trading pairs, swap all assets directly
